original_title: 8½ Intercuts : Life and Films of K.G. George
overview: With a distinct filmography that faithfully depicts a cross-section of the Kerala society on celluloid during his active years, KG George is a master filmmaker and a true genius. This documentary is an attempt to analyse the relevance of his major films and understand his unique personality
tagline: The untold stories of a legend who dreamt and lived cinema
title: 8½ Intercuts : Life and Films of K.G. George
